reviewText: I'm a big fan of laughter and Meet the Browns makes my day every time. You gotta get it. It is the best ever.

FIRST I WANT TO SAY MY REVIEW IS NOT ABOUT THE SHOW, IT IS GREAT AND FUNNY. BUT THE PRODUCT THAT THEY ARE SELLING SAYS THAT IT IS THE COMPLET FIFTH SEASON AND THAT IS A LIE AND A RIPOFF . SOMEONE TOOK THE FIRST 100 EPISODES AND MADE 5 SEASONS OUT OF THAT. ONCE AGAIN THAT IS A LIE. AMAZON YOU SHOULD BE BETTER THAN THAT. BUT I GUESS SINCE I AM KEEPING IT THEY WON. NEXT TIME I SWEAR I AM GOING TO NOT GET RIPOFF AGAIN.
I love this show. I watched it when it first aired now love watching them again. This show will make you laugh in every episode ;()
They all are still great but now I'm becoming annoyed by his stuff. They all seem very prejudice I don't know it's just me I'm just an racist idiot. So, I wouldn't take my advice on anything.
He is really the next Red Foxx and clean Richard Pryor I Really enjoy the show and the whole cast.

I choose this rating because it was this good to me. it was hilarious, this one and all the other episodes.

I would recommend this to everyone. Its enjoyable for the whole family to watch. Loved it.

Love this show, it's always funny and classic! I wish it would have 10 more seasons!
Best show for great laughs!!!

I couldn't wait to see what funny antics Mr. Brown would get into each week, it's a shame that this show was cancelled. With the stuff that is on television these days, it was great to tune in and get laughs from Mr. Brown, family, and friends. Glad that amazon made it possible to relive these funny moments.
I can't say enough about how bad the show always is. We hate to sit down and watch a couple episodes so i dont.
I can't say enough about how wonderful the show always is.  We love to sit down and watch a couple episodes.

Loved It. I really like Brown's character. He's horrible ;-> He's the highlight of the show. I wish there were more than seven seasons. It may have to do with the station. Other than cable stations - seems like more people watch NBC ABC and CBS more.
clean, family oriented, and funny.
Meet the browns is amazing, very, very funny, Tons of laughter, i could watch it over and over again. Great family show.
I bought this show for my Kindle Fire, I am hooked on it. Once I watch all the seasons, I will miss it. I guess I can rewatch!!

I purchased the entire season for my husband and myself because we have never seen the show on television.  We watched Season 1 and if the others are anything like Season 1, we are in for smiles, belly laughter, and thigh hitting enjoyment!!!!!!!!!!  We love the works of Tyler Perry, have all of his plays/movies and now we are staring with his TV shows.
Enjoy watching this season as well I watch them over and over sometimes can't get enough of Mr brown the man is hilarious

Despite all the criticism this show recieved for being "ignorant"... I truly must say I enjoy watching these whole seasons! Mr. Brown is hilarious. Yes the humor is over the top, yes his outfits are out of this world but I think everything just fits. Love the cast! The casting for this show was excellent. Not the greatest actors or actresses but once again, it just works!

If DVD doesn't come with sleeve they shouldn't advertise it with it. Tired of this. Ordered all seven seasons and only two came with sleeves. Yet all seven are shown with sleeves. I'd like to get what was shown. Wouldn't you? Amazon should be ashamed.
I only wish they did more seasons of this show cause it was so funny. just recently bought this can't wait to watch it.
It's a real comedy and one I can watch over and over!!!! This is a great show!! I loved it!!

This series is something I never watched when it was still aired. I bought 3 seasons just to be sure I'd get one specific episode. I'm glad that I did buy them because they've brought hours of enjoyment for my family. My grandparents absolutely love Tyler Perry's awesome foolishness. I'm buying them all!
cant get enough of this show, it is so hilarious, mr brown makes my days i would recommend for laughs

You must see my review on " Tyler Perry's House of Payne complete series 1-8 ". (copy and paste title in Amazon's search box).
I spilled my heart out writing that review of Tyler Perry shows, movies and plays. There are people who don't understand how this television show, Meet The Browns and all Tyler Perry productions, mimics a very funny, people of Color television show, from the 50's. Back then, organizations  fought to get it off the air because of stereo typing, yet today we seem to have revive that genre and loving it.

Simply love it and glad I got it

Probably one of the funniest shows I've ever seen.  Displays wholesome values, in the midst of comedic activity.  I absolutely love this series.  It's on par with some of the funny classics, of yesteryear, like "The Beverly Hillbillies", for instance.  Wish it could have had a longer stretch of time on television.  I really wish they would bring it back on the Oprah network.  Very good show!
If you love humor people then this is what you need to watch!!
